content:
Can anyone suggest something to help this build go through? I haven't had problems before, but now the terminology server appears to be timing out.

Well, it seems to have gone through with time outs only on a certain few elements. I don't know what to make of the errors (message truncated for length).

Life is like a box of chocolates... :)
(never saw this and cannot replicate, sorry. hope it was a glitch)
tx.fhir.org was hung - restarted now
